page.title: 14POPULATION & WORK, WARGRAVE
page.content: Carroll diagram:population of a sample 120 households selected at random. |=========|=========| | {126} | {135} |{>18 years |=========|=========| | {67} | {71 } |{<18 years |=========|=========| {males females} The 1871 census shows more than 25% of the village's working population were involved in agricultural and domestic work. Our 1985 survey was to assess changes in the structure and the extent to which Wargrave has become a dormitory settlement. {%} {EMPLOYMENT} 1.PROFESSIONAL 27 {STRUCTURE } 2.MANAGERIAL 48.5 {OF WARGRAVE } 3.CLERICAL 10.5 {IN 1985 } 4.SKILLED 9 5.SEMI-SKILLED 5 6.UNSKILLED 0
